title: MFW our Riven has max CDR and is going towards blue...
body:
http://i.imgur.com/PaAqLj2.gif

{{champion:103}} ''Riven! You don't need it! You have 45% CDR, ffs!''
{{champion:92}} ''stfu noob i carry''

replies.body: 40 % CDR is max - Riven with BC and Lucidity + mastery has max CDR
I think OP meant that she overstacked CDR. As in she built 45% even though it caps at 40%, meaning that she has a wasted 5% on top of trying to take blue buff.

> [{quoted}](name=CC Kero,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hOL2L97V,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-25T15:06:33.115+0000)
>
> I think OP meant that she overstacked CDR. As in she built 45% even though it caps at 40%, meaning that she has a wasted 5% on top of trying to take blue buff.

This. Thank you! [:
she needed the mana you fucking scrubs
Riven runs oom so quick
Every time I see Riven players they run oom so quickly that they don't even have mana to begin with.
lol yes, good point
Relevant.

I was playing jungling in a game yesterday. Our ADC at full build took my Raptors (that Jinx two shot the camp) and moved on to farming enemies as if they were minions, as if she needed the gold from that camp. I didn't say anything, but in my head I was like "What's the point?"

> [{quoted}](name=Fallen Soraka,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hOL2L97V,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-25T16:07:42.682+0000)
>
> I was playing jungling in a game yesterday. Our ADC at full build took my Raptors (that Jinx two shot the camp) and moved on to farming enemies as if they were minions, as if she needed the gold from that camp. I didn't say anything, but in my head I was like "What's the point?"

Exactly! Our Riven was full build aswell so it's not like she needed the money either haha, and she was already overburning the CDR anyway.

All I could think was "damn Ahri sure was SUPER HELLA HOT in the CG short, yum" ;)

Is max CDR 45% now? I thought it was only 40%?
This Riven probably has 10% from runes/masteries, {{item:3071}} (20%) and {{item:3158}} (15%) adding up to 45%. She ain't getting more than 40% though.
can you not be creepy
Sorry, truly didn't mean to offend.

she is a good example as to why I think manaless champs should have a long cooldown on their abilities since they can harass indefinitely as long as their health isn't to low. this is how I think abilities should be broken up:

mana champs: limited usage - short cooldowns
manaless champs: endless usage - long cooldowns
energy champs: middle since usage is limited but easier to replenish than mana.

by the time late game rolls around, between cdr and mana regen, everything would just about balance itself out
All champs should have mana, and no champ should ever become 'untargetable' ...tada!  Much more balanced game.
no

MFW Riven. "Don't." End of. :P

Ahri, though. <3<3<3

{{champion:103}}
What I hate about the Riven player base is that just because they are playing Riven they are going to carry the game and blame their team for THEIR mistakes

Why didn't you scrubs dive with me, so bad?

You dove them at the nexus turrets....

So?

It's a minute and 30 seconds into the game...Everyone is still level one

Yes that has happened in game...riven wasn't even trolling sadly enough
mfw?

> [{quoted}](name=eveefarmer87,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hOL2L97V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-25T10:40:39.120+0000)
>

My face when.

> [{quoted}](name=Aikki,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hOL2L97V,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-25T10:43:55.917+0000)
>
> My face when.

My feel when.

Well, I don't really want to defend Riven, but doesn't the little cdr stack past the 40% cap? I mean, Riven doesn't use mana, but mana doesn't become a huge issue late-game unless fights extend for awhile.

Honestly I'd rather have it on an energy assassin than Riven, because then they can throw out a lot of harass comparable to a mage and contribute more to a teamfight before the all-in on the squishies.

edit: and for clarification, I did not say Riven is an energy assassin. I'd rather have it on an energy assassin *than* Riven. As in I'd rather eat hot dogs than pork chops. "introducing the second element in a comparison." I was comparing the two, ya goof.
No. You cannot get anymore then 40% CDR (Unless it's URF when everybody has 90%).
thanks, I was mistaken

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hOL2L97V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-25T10:48:02.411+0000)
>
> Well, I don't really want to defend Riven, but doesn't the little cdr stack past the 40% cap? I mean, Riven doesn't use mana, but mana doesn't become a huge issue late-game unless fights extend for awhile.
> 
> Honestly I'd rather have it on an energy assassin than Riven, because then they can throw out a lot of harass comparable to a mage and contribute more to a teamfight before the all-in on the squishies.

There is so many things wrong with your post its not even funny.
You can't go past 40%
Mana is still a problem on ahri unless you bought athenes
Riven doesnt use energy
Riven can't harass, she only all-in's or trades
Shes not even comparable to a mage in terms of harass since she cant do it at all
did anyone else read the riven quote in that stupid robot voice that trolly lol videos use sometimes
